title.$t: Relient K - High of 75

media$title.$t: Relient K - High of 75

media$description.$t:
Relient K - High of 75 ASL 

We were talking together
WE TALK TOGETHER
I said, "what's up with this weather?"
SAID WHATS UP WEATHER
Don't know whether or not
DONT KNOW
How sad I just got
ME SAD
Was of my own volition
MY CHOICE
Or if I'm just missing the sun
ME MISS SUN

And tomorrow, I know,
TOMORROW I KNOW
Will be rainy at best.
RAIN BEST
And the forecast, I know,
FORECAST I KNOW
Is that I'll be depressed.
ME DEPRESSED
But I'll wait outside
ME WAIT OUTSIDE
Hoping that I'll catch sight of the sun.
ME HOPE SEE SUN




Because on and off,
BECAUSE SOMETIMES
The clouds have fought
CLOUDS FIGHT
Their control over the sky
CONTROL SKY

And lately the weather
LATELY WEATHER
Has been so Bi-polar
[BIPOLAR]
And Consequently so have I
SAME AS

And now I'm sunny with a High of 75
ME SUNRAY HIGH [75]
Since You took my heavy heart
SINCE YOU STEAL MY HEART
And made it light
CHANGE

And its funny how you find
FUNNY FIND
You enjoy your life
YOU ENJOY YOUR LIFE
When you're happy to be alive
WHEN YOUR HAPPY ALIVE

And the temperature is freezing
TEMPERATURE FREEZE
And then, after dark,
NIGHT
There is a cold frost sweeping
COLD FROST
In over my heart
HEART COVER

And we might break up
WE BREAK UP MAYBE
If I don't wake up to the sun
IF I NOT WAKE UP SUN

Because on and off,
BECAUSE SOMETIMES
The clouds have fought
CLOUDS FIGHT
Their control over the sky
CONTROL SKY

And lately the weather
LATELY WEATHER
Has been so Bi-polar
[BIPOLAR]
And Consequently so have I
SAME AS

And now I'm sunny with a High of 75
NOW ME SUNRAY HIGH [75]
Since You took my heavy heart
SINCE YOU STEAL MY HEART
And made it light
CHANGE

And its funny how you find
FUNNY FIND
You enjoy your life
YOU ENJOY YOUR LIFE
When you're happy to be alive
WHEN YOUR HAPPY ALIVE

Sunny with a High of 75
SUNRAY HIGH [75]
Since You took my heavy heart
SINCE YOU STEAL MY HEAVY HEART HEAVY
And made it light (made it light)
CHANGE LIGHT

And its funny how you find
FUNNY FIND
You enjoy your life
YOU ENJOY YOUR LIFE
When you're happy to be...Alive
WHEN YOUR HAPPY ALIVE

I DO NOT OWN RIGHTS OR COPYRIGHTS TO THIS SONG!

title.$t: Fresh Prince of Bel-Air Sign Language ASL

media$title.$t: Fresh Prince of Bel-Air Sign Language ASL

media$description.$t:
Saint Francis Sign Language Class did Fresh Prince of Bel-Air for part of their final for Sign 1 & 2. This is ASL. Enjoy!

I DO NOT OWN RIGHTS OR COPYRIGHTS TO THIS SONG!

Now, this is the story all about how
NOW INFORM-you STORY WHAT
My life got flipped-turned upside down
PAST MY LIFE UPSIDE-DOWN
And I'd like to take a minute just sit right there 
NOW STOP SIT-DOWN (HOLD INDEX FINGER UP)
I'll tell you how I became the prince of a town called Bel Air
TELL YOU HOW BECOME PRINCE #BELAIR HOWwg

In west Philadelphia born and raised
WEST PHILADELPHIA ME GROW-UP
On the playground was where I spent most of my days
PLAYGROUND ME FREQUENT
Chillin' out maxin' relaxin' all cool
RELAX LAID-BACK ACT COOL
And all shootin some b-ball outside of school
OUTSIDE SCHOOL WHAT DO-DO SHOOTBASKETBALL
When a couple of guys
Who were up to no good
HAPPEN 4 COME UP TO ME
Startin making trouble in my neighborhood
CAUSE TROUBLE MY CITY
I got in one little fight and my mom got scared
ME GOT IN FIGHT ME MOTHER SCARED
She said 'You're movin' with your auntie and uncle in Bel Air'
SAY YOU MOVE-AWAY WITH AUNT UNCLE INDEX-outward lf  #BELAIR 


I begged and pleaded with her day after day
ME BEG EVERYDAY
But she packed my suite case and sent me on my way
MOTHER PACK SUITCASE FORCE-me GO-lf
She gave me a kiss and then she gave me my ticket.
MOTHER KISS-me GIVE ME TICKET
I put my walkman on and said, 'I might as well kick it'.
PLAY MUSIC PSHAW

First class, yo this is bad
FANCY WOW
Drinking orange juice out of a champagne glass.
ORANGE JUICE FANCY CUP DRINK
Is this what the people of Bel-Air living like?
BEL AIR FINE
Hmmmmm this might be alright.
HMMM MAYBE FUTURE FINE

But wait I hear the prissy,
WAIT ME HEAR THE STUCK UP
Bushwa and all that 
PSHAW EVERYTHING
Is this the kind of place that they just send this cool cat?
IS PLACE PUT ME? 
I don't think so 
ME DISBELIEVE  
I'll see when I get there 
ME ARRIVE SEE IT
I hope theypre prepared
ME HOPE PEOPLE READY
for the Prince of Bel-Air!
FOR FOR PRINCE #BEL AIR

Well I, 
WELL
The plane landed and when I came out 
PLANE (LAND ON HAND) COME OUT
There was a dude, looked like a cop,
MAN LOOK SAME AS COP 
standin there with my name out
MAN STAND RECT-CLname card MY NAME
I ain't tryin to get arrested yet
ME NOT WANT ARREST YET
I just got here
ME RECENTLY ARRIVE HERE
I sprang with the quickness
STAND UP 
and like lightening disappeared
FAST ESCAPE  

I whistled for a cab and when it came near
ME WHISTLE TAXI
The license plate said fresh and it had dice in the mirror
LICENSE PLATE RECT-CL [#FRESH] DRIVER MIRROR STRINGDOWN (2h) C-CLswing back and forth 
If anything I can say is that this cab was rare
TAXI STRANGE
But I thought 'Man forget it' - 'Yo home to Bel Air'
GO-TO #BEL AIR

I pulled up to the house about seven or eight
ARRIVED AT HOUSE 7 8 THEREABOUT
And I yelled to the cabbie 'Yo homes smell ya later'
ME TELL DRIVER SEE YOU LATER
I looked to my kingdom
ME SEE MY KINGDOM
I was finally there
ME HOME AT LAST
To sit on my throne as the Prince of Bel Air
ME (sit down) THRONE #BEL AIR
